doc.field: BABCOCK UNIT WINS ORDER FOR VENEZUELAN POWER PLANT

Deutsche Babcock AG DBCG.F> said its wholly-owned Borsig GmbH subsidiary has won a 78 mln mark order to build a conventional power station block for Venezuela's state-owned electricity company CADAFE. It said the installation, which can be powered by oil or gas, should go on stream at the end of 1988. REUTER
